post:

Located in Los Angeles, all nodes with Quad Core Xeon and 2*1Gbps NIC connected.

Test IP: 205.134.228.164
Test File: http://205.134.228.164/100mb.bin

Features:
We use MAGIX to setup and manage your box. It's automatic and fast. You can easily manage your VPS, like reinstalling OS, changing root pass or turn on/off VPS features.
Also you can enable TUN/PPP/NFS features on MAGIX, it's easy and simple.

Contact:
If you have any question, you can email us [support@libvz.com](mailto:support@libvz.com) or open a ticket in the client area.
